item.description:
Bring your marketing and social media questions to this new webinar.Â 

Bill is teaching an MBA class at a graduate school in Silicon Valley, and he is presenting a Marketing and Social Media Q&A webinar for his MBA students.

You are welcome to attend this free webinar event. Check out details below.

Date: Feb. 20th

Time: 12:00PM-1:00PM

Cost: Free to all

Register and RSVP here: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/561523135777381120

After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar.
item.name: Free Online Webinar: Marketing with Social Media - Q & A
